name: Hallucinations
description: Hallucinations are the dream experience. Visual hallucinations , like seeing a ghost , are the result of the brain's ability to perceive the world in a different way. That was the mystery Cordelia had when she first dreamt of a new house, an open window then thieves breaking into her new house. The dream was so vivid that she could not sleep for days. It was a turning point in her life.
